name: Tabou Party Game
description:
Tabou is a word guessing and a party game. The objective of the game is for a player to have their partners guess the word on the player's card without using the word itself or five additional taboo words listed on the card.

This game suits every type of audience and improves your thought process, communication skills and creativity.

This game supports all iOS devices in both landscape and portrait modes.

With this game you can

* Play 4000 Cards
* Play up to 5 teams
* Configure Passed Cards
* Play/restrict adult content
* Supports English, Spanish and French languages
* Change the default time for each turn
* Change the default win points
* Submit your feedback/concerns right within the app
